entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 30 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing this morning. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 30 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
